Generation VIII.Sword: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures' emotions. If you don't have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.
Generation VIII.Shield: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Because the emotions of others constantly flow into its head, this Pokémon prefers environments where no other creatures live.
Generation IX.Violet: It senses the feelings of other living creatures. Be careful not to expose it to strong emotions for too long, or it will end up exhausted.

Generation VIII.Sword: Trade Maractus in Stow-on-Side Sw Hammerlocke Hills , Motostoke Outskirts , Stony Wilderness Bridge Field , Hammerlocke Hills , Motostoke Riverbank , Stony Wilderness , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Trade Maractus in Stow-on-Side Sw Hammerlocke Hills , Motostoke Outskirts , Stony Wilderness Bridge Field , Hammerlocke Hills , Motostoke Riverbank , Stony Wilderness , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle )
